title: About Me
paragraph: My name is Fayzulla Khojaniyozov, born in 2003. I graduated from the Tashkent University of Information Technologies with a degree in Software Engineering. I primarily work in backend development using PHP (Laravel), and I also have experience with C++, Python, and JavaScript. I’ve contributed to 10+ real-world projects, including GavharRestaurant.uz, Ruslan Café, Turtkul Market System, Car Booking, Baraka Golden Licorice, and Student Dormitory. Beyond development, I’ve taught programming to more than 200 students. Since 2024, I’ve served as a mentor in the “Al‑Khwarizmi’s Successors” initiative, helping young people advance their careers in IT.
